attributes.action: Assign Samuel J O Kirk as his second in command.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition intends to urge the Prime Minister to assign Mr.Samue J O Kirk as his second in command, Mr.Kirk would complete the duties normally carried out by the Prime Minister in his absence. Mr.Kirk would also generally "rock out" while completing the duties.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
